finnish.title: Practice Generosity
finnish.Question1: What is the example of the Macedonian church that Paul shares with the Corinthians?
finnish.Question2: What is Paul's expectation of the Corinthians?
finnish.Question3: What can you learn about generosity from Paul's teaching?
finnish.Question4: In light of what you've learned, ask God to guide you to give generously this week to someone in need.
